body_html:
@bhack reply: We currently have documentation for ONNX -> TRT and if PyTorch has support for PyTorch -> ONNX then it will cover the whole workflow. Indeed, this PR actually promotes existing USE_TENSORRT variable used for Caffe2 on PyTorch's setup.py level. Where in the docs should we mention that?

Overall, I'm still trying to reproduce the failures. All tests are green on my side.

body:
@bhack reply: _We currently have documentation for ONNX -> TRT and if PyTorch has support for PyTorch -> ONNX then it will cover the whole workflow_. Indeed, this PR actually promotes existing USE_TENSORRT variable used for Caffe2 on PyTorch's setup.py level. Where in the docs should we mention that?

Overall, I'm still trying to reproduce the failures. All tests are green on my side.
